code: import http from'../http-common';import{UploadHttp}from'../http-common';var createDiscount=function createDiscount(data){return UploadHttp.post("/orders/createDiscount",data);};var getDiscounts=function getDiscounts(data){return http.get("/orders/getDiscounts",data);};var deleteDiscount=function deleteDiscount(discountId){return http.delete("/orders/discounts/".concat(discountId));};var checkDiscount=function checkDiscount(discountId){return http.get("/orders/checkDiscount/".concat(discountId));};var DiscountService={createDiscount:createDiscount,checkDiscount:checkDiscount,getDiscounts:getDiscounts,deleteDiscount:deleteDiscount};export default DiscountService;
